content: parts of it sell the creation made from these patterns without particularly permission of the author if you have any questions feel free to ask on this e-mail vendula maderska@seznam cz thank you ♥ february 2013 10 magic with hook and needles w ww vendulkam blogspot com right sleeve 5 years old work in rounds shaping as for left sleeve and working throughout in one round of double_crochet followed by one round of holes use the same color sequence as on the yoke for the double_crochet rounds but work every hole round in light green round 1 3 chain as 1st double_crochet 1 chain skip 1 stitch *1 double_crochet in next stitch 1 chain skip 1 stitch* repeat from * around join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 28 holes round 2 3 chain 1 double_crochet in first hole *2 double_crochet in every hole* repeat around join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 56 stitches rounds 3 7 repeat rounds 2 and 3 two times then round 2 once round 8 begin shaping the sleeve 3 chain work 1 double_crochet in next hole and 2 double_crochet in every hole around to the last working only 1 double_crochet in last hole join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 54 stitches round 9 3 chain 1 chain skip 1 stitch *1 double_crochet 1 chain skip 1 stitch* repeat from * around join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 27 holes round 10 3 chain work 1 double_crochet in next hole and 2 double_crochet in every hole around to the last working only 1 double_crochet in last hole join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 52 stitches round 11 3 chain 1 chain skip 1 stitch *1 double_crochet 1 chain skip 1 stitch repeat from * around join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 26 holes round 12 3 chain 1 double_crochet in next hole and 2 double_crochet in every hole around to the last working only 1 double_crochet in last hole join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 50 stitches round 13 3 chain 1 chain skip 1 stitch *1 double_crochet 1 chain skip 1 stitch repeat from * around join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 25 holes round 14 begin increasing sleeve 3 chain 2 double_crochet in next hole then 2 double_crochet in every hole around to the last working 3 double_crochet in last hole join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 52 stitches round 15 3 chain as 1st double_crochet 1 chain skip 1 stitch *1 double_crochet 1 chain skip 1 stitch repeat from * around join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 26 holes round 16 3 chain 2 double_crochet in next hole then 2 double_crochet in every hole around to the last working 3 double_crochet in last hole join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 54 stitches round 17 3 chain as 1st double_crochet 1 chain skip 1 stitch *1 double_crochet 1 chain skip 1 stitch
